title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 September 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:06  has quit 00:14  has joined #xwiki 00:15  Hi all - would anyone be so kind as to help me troubleshoot a start-up problem I'm having with xwiki? I just tried to restart via the startup.bat file after several months and it appears to no longer do anything. 00:16  The shutdown.bat file didn't function, so prior to restarting I issued a ctr-c kill to the process 00:20  argh - cancel that, something had corrupted my setenv.bat file... had invalid characters all over it 00:20  fixed. Sorry to disturb 00:27  has quit 00:52  has quit 00:57  has quit 00:57  has joined #xwiki 02:42  has quit 03:17  has joined #xwiki 03:56  has quit 03:57  has joined #xwiki 04:23  has joined #xwiki 04:25  has quit 04:25  is now known as 05:48  has joined #xwiki 06:43  has joined #xwiki 06:43  has joined #xwiki 07:03  has joined #xwiki 07:03  has quit 07:16  has quit 07:22  has left #xwiki 07:32  has quit 07:54  has joined #xwiki 08:01  has joined #xwiki 08:04  has quit 08:04  has joined #xwiki 08:34  good morning 08:35  so we just need to fix functional tests and we're good it seems.... 08:35  checking what's fialing now 08:35  mflorea: I think this one is for you: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/1781/testReport/org.xwiki.test.escaping/TemplateTest/templates\_distribution\_vm\_\_extensionVersion\_\_extensionId\_\_action\_\_xredirect\_\_\_testParameterEscaping/ http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1041/testReport/ ? 08:36 <+mflorea> probably yes 08:37  the first one is apparently just a whitespace 08:37  (after the dot) 08:37  expected:<... different keywords.[ ]Alternatively, if yo...> but was:<... different keywords.[ ]Alternatively, if yo...> 08:37  acutally the expected is a NL 08:38  and it was a whitespace before 08:38  http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1041/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.extension/ExtensionTest/testSimpleSearch/ 08:38 <+mflorea> I know why 08:38  do you know about this selenium1 test failing: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/1767/testReport/org.xwiki.test.selenium/AllDocsTest/testTreeViewInit/ 08:38  ? 08:39  error doesn't explain much 08:39 <+mflorea> no, I have to run it locally 08:40  hmmm test-ui doens't build Private key '/home/hudsonagent/.ssh/id\_dsa' not found" 08:41 <+mflorea> yes, strange 08:45  has joined #xwiki 09:10  has quit 09:14  tmortagne master \* r3b524a7 available applications inside the wiki - http://git.io/zcvs5g 11:24  tmortagne stable-4.1.x \* ref9c6aa https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/ef9c6aa3b91b8366c29aa0c60c18346aaf211c15 / XE-1232: Tomcat application context in Debian package contains invalid attribute - http://git.io/YwiDBA 11:33  has quit 12:01  has joined #xwiki 12:49  Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r7f8bd59 location can be taken from the request parameters which are set by the test and are not valid URLs. - http://git.io/QaESQA 12:51 <+mflorea> jvdrean: you need to fix http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/1767/testReport/ 12:53 <+jvdrean> mflorea: thx for the ping 12:53 <+jvdrean> so we can't use the id attribute in panels present by default, hum 12:54 <+mflorea> yeah, you get duplicated id when you view the panel page 12:56 <+jvdrean> I wonder what would be the proper fix 13:31  Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r5f20d56 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/5f20d562506771aea755b274e5c3ce003cb1dd70 / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/selenium/AllDocsTest.java : Dashboard space is now completely hidden. - http://git.io/ES6l\_g 13:37  Jean-Vincent Drean master \* r2e4c2cc https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2e4c2cc14791b6d45e81e219095887aeb163797b / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-uiextension/xwiki-platform-uiextension-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/UIExtensionSheet.xml : XWIKI-649 : Mechanism for inserting custom content in pre-existing code - http://git.io/Mn03Lw 13:38  jvdrean: why not use the box macro? 13:39  (it's an open question, I do't have a strong opinion, I know that I've used the box macro in some wiki macro demo pages) 13:39 <+jvdrean> it was considered inline, I got multiple

from it 13:40 <+jvdrean> actually I should have used {{code language="none"}} 13:40  hmm not sure 13:40  the code macro is really slow 13:40  ah 13:40  language = none is fast 13:41  so far w edon't use it anywhere in XE 13:41  indeed I hadn't thought about using language=none in my wiki macros 13:41  OTOH 13:42  it draws a dependency you might not need 13:42  so that's a godo point to not use a macro 13:42  I don't know what's best.... 13:44 <+jvdrean> indeed it would create a strong dependency 13:46 <+mflorea> guys, I just got this when I run locally extension tests http://pastebin.com/31ex6tdn : "integrity constraint violation: unique constraint or index violation; SYS\_PK\_10163 table: XWIKIRCS " looks bad, and seems to be rooted in DefaultWikiComponentBuilderEventListener. 13:47 <+mflorea> the wiki works though 13:47 <+mflorea> afaics 13:50 <+jvdrean> DefaultWikiComponentBuilderEventListener, another one for me then 13:53 <+jvdrean> I still don't know how to solve my issue with the Applications panel, I need at least one ID in it to register JS callback 13:55  has quit 13:56 <+jvdrean> I could 13:56 <+jvdrean> 1/ remove the panel from the side when viewing the panel document 13:56 <+jvdrean> 2/ add an exception somewhere in the tests 13:58  lunch time 14:08 <+Enygma`> jvdrean: why not use a class instead of an ID? 14:08 <+Enygma`> AFAIK, that`s usually the solution for this types of cases 14:09 <+Enygma`> \*these 14:10 <+Enygma`> guys, any idea what`s wrong with xwiki-enterprise? http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise/9357/console 14:11 <+Enygma`> ...MojoExecutionException: An Ant BuildException has occured: net.sf.launch4j.BuilderException: net.sf.launch4j.ExecException: java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "/home/hudsonagent/hudson\_root/workspace/xwiki-enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-installers/xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows/target/dependency/bin/windres": java.io.IOException: error=2, No such file or directory around Ant part ... Enygma`: windows installer build works fine locally. there must be something with the CI agent 14:18  This is definitely weird... I just read a blog post about Feedly, I thought "wow, that is exactly what we need for our security news monitoring team... if only it was connected to our XWiki infrastructure in some way...", I search for it on Google and I discover Feedly has been acquired recently by... XWiki. You guys should stop reading my mind. In the future. :) 14:19 <+Enygma`> tillo: did you also look at the date of that blogpost? :) 14:19  Enygma`: of course, that was the second thing I look at, just now ;) 14:20  Anyway, I still need some way to link them :D 14:21 <+Enygma`> jvdrean: $$('.applicationPanelMoreButton')[0] is not that hackish 14:23 <+Enygma`> jvdrean: anyway, if it`s a callback, why not just pass the clicked element to the callback, instead of doing a DOM query in the callback? 14:25 <+jvdrean> the event then makes another element visible (was: hidden) 14:25 <+jvdrean> note: since we need a quickfix I'm doing it with classes 14:25 <+Enygma`> +1 for classes 14:27 <+jvdrean> damn, scriptaculous effects take only the id as a parameter to get an element, not an element directly 14:27 <+Enygma`> jvdrean:  actually, you might want to do $$('.applicationPanelMoreButton').each(... instead, since the JS for both the panel and the panel page in view mode should work. 14:28 <+Enygma`> bad API on their side :) 14:30  has quit 14:34 <+Enygma`> I`ve excluded maven-agent3 from the xwiki-enterprise job... let's see if the windows installer builds right now 14:38  Eduard Moraru master \* r2915f2e https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/2915f2e692b9473887af3f32c7f37197d7e94ddb / pom.xml : Update CLIRR version to compare to after 4.1.4 release - http://git.io/nODmcg 14:42  has joined #xwiki 14:45  has quit 14:49  Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rc9f36b2 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/c9f36b232b73a933426d5bf7bf192a4c11784027 / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/ui/extension/ExtensionTest.java : Fix test (the error message container doesn't preserve the whitespace anymore). - http://git.io/MWw-nQ 14:54  Marius Dumitru Florea master \* re24f55b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/e24f55b9e885a5f8a1435212da4acfc227d6e0db / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/uicomponents/extension/extension.js : The XWiki.contextaction is never 'get'. It is the action use to load the page that loads the JavaScript code. - http://git.io/S9swyQ 15:19  has joined #xwiki 15:26  hmm we have a bug 15:27  when I try to delete http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Xwiki/WebHome it finds pages using it but it's wrong, it's not taking into account the case 15:52 <+jvdrean> Enygma`: in the end the fix with classes looks good 15:52 <+Enygma`> cool 15:53  Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r3f825d4 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/3f825d4c8262070b61fdc8dd00025f8ba45d9271 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-packager-plugin/src/main/java/org/xwiki/tool/packager/PackageMojo.java : Add xwiki-portlet to the list of mandatory artifacts because we added DispatchFilter to the default web.xml - http://git.io/haRDtQ 15:53 <+jvdrean> except for the need for a random ID at some point, because of scriptaculous limitations 15:53 <+Enygma`> well, AFAIK we are not supposed to use scriptaculous 15:54 <+Enygma`> it's used only in the document index tree AFAIU... and we are not very happy about that either 15:54 <+jvdrean> mflorea: I'm gonna grab something to eat and I'll try to reproduce the issue you had at startup 15:54 <+mflorea> ok, thanks 15:54  has quit 15:56  has joined #xwiki 15:58 <+Enygma`> guys, as tested browser for the M3 release, what should I put? Firefox 11.0? 15:58 <+Enygma`> sburjan: ? 16:01 <+sburjan> Enygma`: you can put 11, yes.  Are you editing the page ? There's a section I have to remove 16:02 <+Enygma`> please review it, sburjan, specially the testing part 16:02 <+sburjan> ok 16:02 <+Enygma`> thanks 16:03 <+sburjan> Enygma`: on which FF we're running our ui-tests ATM ? 16:03 <+sburjan> 11 or 12 ? 16:04 <+Enygma`> not sure, that`s why I asked 16:04 <+sburjan> well I don't know 16:05 <+sburjan> I'll leave 11 16:05 <+sburjan> done 16:05  mflorea: I've commented on https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/3f825d4c8262070b61fdc8dd00025f8ba45d9271#commitcomment-1837333 16:05 <+Enygma`> thanks sburjan 16:06 <+mflorea> vmassol: that's in a branch dedicated for portlet integration 16:06  ah ok less worries then  ;) 16:07 <+mflorea> it's not going to end in master 16:07  it shouldn't end in 3.5.x either 16:07 <+mflorea> I just made that change to be able to build the branch 16:07 <+mflorea> sure sure 16:07  ok 16:11 <+Enygma`> tmortagne: Are you handling this http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1043/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.extension/ExtensionTest/testInstall/ ? 16:12 <+mflorea> it's fixed 16:15 <+Enygma`> guys, when is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-649 scheduled for? 16:16 <+Enygma`> commits are going into master since 03.september (8 days ago), but the issue is scheduled for Future 16:16 <+Enygma`> jvdrean, vmassol? 16:16  future is wrong 16:17  there's no affects either 16:17 <+Enygma`> so it should be for 4.2M3? 16:17  it's done except for the doc AFAIK, jvdrean needs to hurry up and fix the affects/fixfor+add doc :) 16:17  yes it's for 4.2M3 16:17 <+Enygma`> I will set the fix for, in order to show up in our filters 16:17  ah wait 16:18 <+Enygma`> it was under the radar :) 16:18  I mixed up with another issue 16:18  this one should be closed as dup IMO 16:18  let me handle it 16:18 <+Enygma`> it has commits... 16:18  hmm 16:18  let me check that 16:18 <+Enygma`> ok 16:18 <+Enygma`> side note: wow is this an old issue :) 16:19  indeed 16:19  jvdrean: can you explain? 16:19  (so in the end I didn't mix p) 16:19  \*up 16:20 <+jvdrean> vmassol: explain what ? 16:20  the status of this issue 16:20  and why it has not affets, no fix for 16:20  and why you're not assigned 16:20 <+jvdrean> I just fixed this 16:20  and why t's not closed 16:20  :) 16:20 <+Enygma`> would be cool if we could fix and close all old issues this way :P 16:21  jvdrean: ok so you didn't have any other issue about this elsewhere? 16:21  it's still missing doc to be able to release btw 16:22 <+Enygma`> yep, 2 issues missing doc: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/IssueNavigator!executeAdvanced.jspa?jqlQuery=Project+in+%28%22XWiki+Commons%22%2C+%22XWiki+Rendering%22%2C+%22XWiki+Platform%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise+Manager%22%29+and+fixVersion+in+%28%224.2-milestone-3%22%29+and+resolution+in+%28%22Fixed%22%29+and+%28%28Documentation+is+EMPTY%29+or+%28%22Documentation+in+Release+Notes%22+is+EMPTY%29%29&runQuery=true&clear=true 16:22  IMO it should also have a link to the Wiki component issue 16:22  (as a depend on) 16:27  has joined #xwiki 16:33 <+jvdrean> mflorea: I'm not able to reproduce yet 16:34 <+mflorea> jvdrean: it happened only once for me so far 16:34 <+mflorea> so it must be hard to debug 16:39 <+Enygma`> mflorea: do you know if this is fixed already? http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/1769/testReport/org.xwiki.test.selenium/UsersGroupsRightsManagementTest/testCreateAndDeleteGroup/ 16:40 <+mflorea> that is a flicker 16:54  Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r0996dc7 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/0996dc70465a70318b942662a4a7a74b93538086 / xwiki-enterprise-web/pom.xml : Include XWiki Portlet in the enterprise war. - http://git.io/21MOOQ 17:11  has quit 17:18  has quit 17:42  has quit 17:46  has joined #xwiki 17:57  has quit 18:00  has joined #xwiki 18:01  Is there a problem with the XWiki.org sites? I cannot reach them this morning. 18:01  Denis: works for me, any url in particular? 18:02  vmassol:  I've tried www.xwiki.org and http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/All+Attachments+Livetable 18:02  Perhaps it's an issues with tethering from my phone... 18:02  works ehre 18:20  is now known as 18:45  Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* rb0bee0c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b0bee0cafd2e94829d75276d6bd78c7b93c098b5 / (10 files in 5 dirs): Upgrade to Portlet API 2.0 - http://git.io/-zRbhA 18:45  Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r4302116 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/43021163094ae0782796e128b2c08e20580cf401 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-rendering/xwiki-platform-rendering-xwiki/pom.xml : Upgrade to CSSParser 0.9.7 - http://git.io/dJB6BA 18:47  has quit 18:49  Vincent Massol master \* rb49e897 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b49e897e36cb4e70e286cd1e6c21d23637e8eab7 / (2 files in 2 dirs): [Misc] Typo - http://git.io/-gmPow 18:49  Vincent Massol master \* rb720048 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b7200487e7a05df16e5722e9c2d359f7bd9f0fa8 / (7 files in 4 dirs): XWiki-8196: Add XY Line 3D and XY Step Chart types to the Chart Macro - http://git.io/qI5Niw 18:49  jvdrean: you have a lock on the RN. Let me know when you're done 18:50 <+jvdrean> vmassol: I'm done 18:51  has quit 19:30  has quit 19:33  is now known as 20:00  has joined #xwiki 20:24  has joined #xwiki 20:55  has quit 21:08  is now known as 21:09  has joined #xwiki 21:39  has quit 22:55  has quit 22:57  has joined #xwiki 23:22  has quit 23:26  has joined #xwiki 23:46  has quit 23:52  has joined #xwiki {{/code}}
